ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectBergeron, The Hon. France, RELOCATION EXPENSES
PrecisOrder prescribing additional periods during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to the Hon. FRANCE BERGERON, who was required to relocate to the City of Qu√©bec, Quebec, following her appointment on October 1, 2009 as a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec.
